speaking_points.instructions: Describe how you manage your time and stay organized with your studies.
prompts: Describe how you keep track of your assignments and deadlines. What tools or methods do you use to stay organized?
Talk about a time when you felt overwhelmed with your academic responsibilities. How did you manage your time to handle everything?

speaking_points.instructions: Talk about your daily study habits and how they help you succeed in your academics.
prompts: What are some of your daily study habits? How do they help you stay on top of your coursework?
Describe a study habit you developed recently. Why did you decide to start this habit, and how has it improved your learning?

speaking_points.instructions: Share your strategies for staying focused and avoiding distractions during studying.
prompts: Explain some techniques you use to avoid distractions when you study. How effective are they?
Describe a challenging situation where it was difficult for you to stay focused. What strategies did you use to overcome it?

speaking_points.instructions: Talk about the ways you handle stress during exam periods.
prompts: What do you do to relax and reduce stress before an exam? Describe your routine.
Can you share an experience where you felt very stressed during an exam period? What did you do to stay calm and perform well?

speaking_points.instructions: Discuss the role of your classmates or friends in supporting your academic progress
prompts: How do your classmates or friends support you in your studies? Share an example of how working with them helped you understand a difficult concept.
Describe a time when you helped a classmate or friend with their studies. How did it feel, and what did you learn from the experience?
